ai_analysis:
PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT: Good

Rogue Creamery generated $14,138.83 in email-attributed revenue over 7 days.

KEY INSIGHTS:
• Campaigns (73%) are driving majority of revenue - strong promotional performance
• Flow automation (27%) has optimization potential
• Average order value of $134.66 indicates healthy basket size

TOP 3 ACTION ITEMS:
1. Optimize abandoned cart flow to increase automation revenue
2. Test holiday cheese gift bundle campaigns
3. Implement post-purchase upsell flow for cheese accessories
